channel.title: Modscape v2 Dev. Team
channel.description:
Ok Modscape is ready To be made into a v2! heres wat i need
[ul][li]Coder for specs[/li] [li]Hoster[/li] [li]Fourm admin[/li] [li]Fourm creator[/li] [li]Head Admin[/li][/ul]
If interested please fill in app
Information: As a hoster you will need to hold up to 80+ people without lagging till at least 60
As Forums Admin you must be active at least 5+ hours if not more.
Server Mod must be active if there are no admins available(depending how long and when the server is up.)
Server Admins must always be online if owner or co-owner aren't online(depending how long and when the server is up provided by the hoster)
Coders must have really good experience with sites(including SMF IpbFree Freewebs spruz and many more) must provide server with a decent logo, good with SMF coding (not smfforfree).
Forums Coder must provide server with a domain name and web hoster(my runelocus webhosted by god of ikiliki isnt working and god wont answer PM's) and must be able to code stuff without help. heres app
[code] Job Wanted: Age: E-mail: Name: Experience(Needed): Proof(Needed): Other Info that might help: [/code]

item.title: Modscape v2 Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Job Wanted:Anything or all
Age:14
E-mail:(i’ll tell you in pm)
Name:Kyle
Experience(Needed): I own my own forums i run my own server i know how to run things and what happens if the economy is not properly ran.
Proof(Needed): If you want i’ll pm you something.
Other Info that might help: Ask in a pm and i’d be happy to send.

Read full topic
